apiId.description: API ID for the GraphQL API.

cachingConfig.description: The Caching Config. See Caching Config.

code.description: The function code that contains the request and response functions. When code is used, the runtime is required. The runtime value must be APPSYNC_JS.

field.description: Field name from the schema defined in the GraphQL API.

kind.description: Resolver type. Valid values are `UNIT` and `PIPELINE`.

maxBatchSize.description: Maximum batching size for a resolver. Valid values are between `0` and `2000`.

pipelineConfig.description: The caching configuration for the resolver. See Pipeline Config.

requestTemplate.description: Request mapping template for UNIT resolver or 'before mapping template' for PIPELINE resolver. Required for non-Lambda resolvers.

responseTemplate.description: Response mapping template for UNIT resolver or 'after mapping template' for PIPELINE resolver. Required for non-Lambda resolvers.

runtime.description: Describes a runtime used by an AWS AppSync pipeline resolver or AWS AppSync function. Specifies the name and version of the runtime to use. Note that if a runtime is specified, code must also be specified. See Runtime.

syncConfig.description: Describes a Sync configuration for a resolver. See Sync Config.

type.description: Type name from the schema defined in the GraphQL API.

apiId.description: API ID for the GraphQL API.

cachingConfig.description: The Caching Config. See Caching Config.

maxBatchSize.description: Maximum batching size for a resolver. Valid values are between `0` and `2000`.

pipelineConfig.description: The caching configuration for the resolver. See Pipeline Config.

requestTemplate.description: Request mapping template for UNIT resolver or 'before mapping template' for PIPELINE resolver. Required for non-Lambda resolvers.

responseTemplate.description: Response mapping template for UNIT resolver or 'after mapping template' for PIPELINE resolver. Required for non-Lambda resolvers.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Resolver resources.
